alert.note: Alert for Kingsbury; Miner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:32PM MDT until April 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM CDT THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Kingsbury and Miner Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM Wednesday to 1 AM CDT Thursday. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
